biotools.summary: Web server that automatically generates and annotates circular plasmid maps.  The tool has: a built in set of features that can be displayed (ie. RE sites, tags, ORFs, etc.), allows users to define custom features to display, contains a library of commonly used plasmids, and, generates nice looking images in a variety of output formats.

bioschemas.name: PlasMapper
